00058 #define WWDG_Prescaler_2    ((uint32_t)0x00000080)
00059 #define WWDG_Prescaler_4    ((uint32_t)0x00000100)
00060 #define WWDG_Prescaler_8    ((uint32_t)0x00000180)
00061 #define IS_WWDG_PRESCALER(PRESCALER) (((PRESCALER) == WWDG_Prescaler_1) || \
00062                                       ((PRESCALER) == WWDG_Prescaler_2) || \
00063                                       ((PRESCALER) == WWDG_Prescaler_4) || \
00064                                       ((PRESCALER) == WWDG_Prescaler_8))
00065 #define IS_WWDG_WINDOW_VALUE(VALUE) ((VALUE) <= 0x7F)
00066 #define IS_WWDG_COUNTER(COUNTER) (((COUNTER) >= 0x40) && ((COUNTER) <= 0x7F))
